#include<iostream>
#define MAX 1000001
using namespace std;
int prime[MAX]={0};
long long prime_count[MAX]={0};
void sieve(){
 prime[0]=prime[1]=0;     
 int j;
 long long count=0;
 for(int i=2;i<MAX;i++){
     j=2;
   prime_count[i]=count; 
   if(!prime[i]){
     count+=i;            
      
     while(i*j<MAX){
                 
      prime[i*j++]=1;              
     }
                       
   }     
 }    
}
int main(){
  sieve();
  int t,n;
  //cout<<prime_count[1000000];
  cin>>t;
  while(t--){
   cin>>n;
              
   cout<<prime_count[n]<<endl;          
  }  
 return 0;    
}
